title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, push models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same features as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, Android support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; chat, pull, delete, copy models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI for chatting, managing models, and monitoring Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) and compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+, MAUI sample app.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain in a single Docker Compose.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm, or Q&A using Ollama.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama; same capabilities as ollama-js repo.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package for Ollama; mirrors ollama-python repo.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for model tips, integrations, and troubleshooting.

title: ollama-hackernews
summary: Hacker News discussion on Ollama v0.1.30 release with tool-use support.
